channel.title: 508 Client not working
channel.description:
Hello any 508 client i download like it will run and everything but like as it says its loading like updating server crap the red bar going up it like wont go load up anymore and it will just stay where its at.
Can anyone help.
For more information give me your msn and ill add you thanks.

item.title: 508 Client not working
item.dc:creator: @cbk666 cbk666
item.description:

Okay. I got that thanks. But i would like other people to join, i have portforwarded too. But idk if it works.

item.title: 508 Client not working
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

Change the ip to 127.0.0.1 This is localhost, that should get you online only not other people.
